mapper.insert: insert into file_upload(`name`, `path`, `related_id`,`type`, `create_time`, `update_time`) values(#{name}, #{path}, #{relatedId}, #{type}, now(), now())
update file_upload set name = #{name},path = #{path},related_id = #{relatedId},type = #{type}, update_time=now() where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name from file_upload order by name
select * from file_upload order by name
